Name: App:CFD:Contentful:SpaceID
Description: The Contentful SpaceID, belonging tot the CFD content space

Name: App:CFD:Contentful:AccessToken
Description: The Contentful Content Delivery Token, linked to the CFD content space

Name: App:CFD:Contentful:Environment
Description: The (optional) Contentful environment. Defaults to master

Name: App:CFD:Lokalise:AccessToken
Description: Lokalise SDK Token

Name: App:CFD:Lokalise:ProjectID
Description: Lokalise Project ID

Name: App:ScanTarget
Description: { Details = 0, Cart = 1 }

Name: App:Scandit:AppKey
Description: Deprecated app setting for Scandit license key. Please use App:Scandit:LicenseKey instead

Name: App:Scandit:LicenseKey
Description: App setting for the Scandit license key

Name: App:Scandit:WorkingRange
Description: { Normal = 0, Long = 1 }

Name: App:Session:LockTimeout
Description: The app will lock after an inactivity of x seconds.

Name: App:Customer:Enabled
Description: Whether to always show the customer attach button in the checkout or not

Name: App:Customer:ShowBarcode
Description: Determines whether to show the customer barcode in the customer details page or not

Name: App:Customer:ShowSearchOnCFD
Description: Show an customer search option to send to CFD

Name: App:Customer:ShowGender
Description: Determine whether to show gender customer details page or not

Name: App:Customer:SuggestUpdateAddressOnOpenOrders
Description: Whether we open up a special page to suggest the user to update open orders

Name: App:Customer:ShowAddresses
Description: Determine whether to show addresses customer details page or not

Name: App:Customer:ShowDayOfBirth
Description: Determines whether to show the date of birth customer details page or not

Name: App:Customer:ShowFiscalID
Description: Determines whether to show the fiscal ID on the customer details page or not

Name: App:Customer:ShowPreview
Description: Whether to show the customer details page after customer creation or not

Name: App:Customer:ShowCompany
Description: Whether we show the company fields in the customer create/edit page

Name: App:Customer:UseSocialSecurityNumberLookup
Description: Whether the social security number functionality is enabled or not

Name: App:Customer:ShowVerifyOnCFDButton
Description: Enables the Onboarding button in POS create customer where you can trigger customer onboarding on CFD

Name: App:Customer:UsePhoneNumberLookup
Description: Dictates if the LinkMobility platform is enabled

Name: App:Order:ShowVatNumber
Description: Whether to show the vat number tile or not

Name: App:Order:ShowEstimatedDeliveryTime
Description: Determines whether we render the delivery proposition card non the checkout or not

Name: App:Order:ShowCustomerReference
Description: Determine whether to show the customer reference field when on delivery

Name: App:Documents:DefaultEmailInvoice
Description: Determines the default value of the email checkbox in the print order pop up ( in the checkout )

Name: App:Documents:ShowPrintGiftReceipt
Description: Will be used to determine if we show print gift receipt or not

Name: App:Search:DefaultMethod
Description: { Query = 0, CustomID = 1 }

Name: App:Search:ProductLogicalLevel
Description: Determines which logical level to do a product search on

Name: App:Search:ProductProperties
Description: What product properties to filter on

Name: App:StockReservationTask:AvailableActions
Description: What actions are available in the stock reservation task, { ForceComplete = 1, Order = 2, SetAside = 4, Cancel = 8, All = 15 }

Name: App:LineActionTypes:AllowMixing
Description: Replaced with the normal setting Orders:AllowMixed

Name: App:Subscriptions:Enabled
Description: Whether to use the new subscriptions or not

Name: App:Basket:View
Description: { ListView = 0, CardView = 1 }

Name: App:Search:View
Description: Detemines how we show search results in our application, { ListView = 0, CardView = 1 }

Name: App:LineActionTypes:Visible
Description: Whether we should show LineActionType icons on orderline level

Name: App:Shipments:AllowRemoteManualReceive
Description: Allows receive goods tasks to be confirmed manually

Name: App:WishLists:Enabled
Description: Whether we allow the creation of wishlists in this app or not

Name: App:GiftWrapping:Enabled
Description: Whether the application allows order giftwrapping or not

Name: App:Bundles:Behavior
Description: How bundles are presented to the user on add (0=Default, 1=Fashion, 2=Disabled)

Name: App:CycleCount:RequireAllZonesToBeCounted
Description: Whether all zones need to be counted in order to complete a zoned cycle count

Name: App:CashDrawer:OpenReason
Description: { Hide = 0, Show = 1, Required = 2 }

Name: App:GiftCard:DefaultType
Description: The default giftcard type

Name: App:CashExpense:WarningThreshold
Description: Defines a threshold for the maximum cash expense amount (in the currency of the organization) before a warning should be raised, to prevent mistakes. Defaults to null, which means no warning should be raised.

Name: App:CashExpense:Image:Enforced
Description: Enforce stores to always include a receipt photo when customers add expenses.

Name: App:CashJournal:RequestRecount
Description: Based on the boolean, the app will request a recount before creating an automated correction and submitting the count to the server

Name: App:Search:DefaultUserTypeOverride
Description: The default UserType that should be used when doing a product search. { Employee = 1, Customer = 2 }

Name: App:Product:HideRelations
Description: Hides related products in the product details panel, based on ProductRelationTypeBackendID

Name: App:Checkout:ProductSearchTemplateID
Description: Whenever we have a quick buy option in the checkout, we will use this setting to find quick buy products

Name: App:Shipping:ProductSearchTemplateID
Description: Based on this, we will show / hide the quick bag select option in the SFS ship page

Name: App:ProductDetail:Properties
Description: Example: { "EVA-Admin": ["display_value", ...], ... }

Name: App:AllowSoldByOverride
Description: Detemines whether we show a 'sold by' tile on the checkout or not

Name: App:ShowBundleConfigOnAdd
Description: Dictates if we show the possible bundle config modal on adding a product to cart

Name: App:ShowStationSelectorOnLogin
Description: Whether we show the station selector after login or not

Name: App:ShipFromStore:AllowPartialPick
Description: Whether partial picking is allowed for ship from store (pick) tasks or not

Name: App:ShipFromStore:PaymentMethods
Description: What payment methods to show for ship from store (delivery) tasks

Name: App:ShipFromStore:ProductPropertiesToShow
Description: Used to instruct the frontend what properties of the product(s) to show in the SFS pick screen

Name: App:ShipFromStore:SupportMultipleShipments
Description: Whether the SFS flow supports multiple shipments or not

Name: App:Checkout:FastReservationEnabled
Description: App setting for companion app to skip the shopping cart after scanning the QR code of the reservation.

Name: App:Feature:StockReplenishmentTask:Enabled
Description: Whether the runner tasks functionality is enabled or not

Name: App:Feature:LockOnOrganizationUnit:Enabled
Description: Whether we save the organisation unit logged in with or not

Name: App:Checkout:ShowSignOrder
Description: Whether to show the signature button in the checkout or not

Name: App:Shipments:RequireReceiveMethodReason
Description: New name: Orders:Shipments:RequireReceiveMethodReason

Name: App:ReturnToSupplier:ShipmentCanHaveTrackingCode
Description: Indicates if return to supplier shipments can have tracking code.

Name: App:CashJournal:ShowExpectedAmount
Description: Show expected amount when counting cash journals.

Name: App:PrintPriceLabelTask:PrintPriceLabelRequired
Description: Indicates if it is required to print a price label task.

Name: App:SearchUsers:IncludeCustomers
Description: Indicates whether or not to include customers in search results.

Name: App:SearchUsers:IncludeEmployees
Description: Indicates whether or not to include employees in search results.

Name: App:ShipFromStore:PrintReceiptAfterCompletion
Description: Indicates whether or not to print receipt after completing the checkout successfully.

Name: App:Pos:DefaultRoute
Description: Changes what page the POS navigates to after logging in

Name: App:Pos:DisableNavigationOnOpenAmount
Description: Indicates whether it is allowed to navigate away from an order with an open amount on the POS

Name: App:Checkout:ShowQuickBuy
Description: If the app should force Quick Buy into view or not

Name: App:Checkout:HideShowMore
Description: Hide ShowMore tile

Name: App:Pos:DisplayEndOfDayQuestion
Description: Indicates whether or not to display the end of day question on the POS

Name: App:Pos:DocumentationBlobCategory
Description: Indicates the blob category that holds the in-store documentation

Name: App:Pos:EnableNativeKeyboard
Description: Indicates whether or not to use the native keyboard

Name: App:Pos:DisplayExpectedAmountOnCashJournal
Description: Indicates whether or not to display the expected amount when counting a cashjournal

Name: App:Pos:Contentful:SpaceID
Description: Contentful space ID that contains POS content

Name: App:Pos:Contentful:AccessToken
Description: Contentful Client delivery token to fetch the content for POS

Name: App:Feature:RefundOrder:Enabled
Description: Indicates whether or not to display the refund order button on returns

Name: App:ConfigurableProduct:FilterProperties
Description: Filter properties for GetConfigurableProductDetail. Example: { "Asian_fit": [true, ...], ... }

Name: App:ConfigurableProduct:FilterProperty
Description: Filter property for GetConfigurableProductDetail

Name: App:ConfigurableProduct:FilterValues
Description: Filter values for GetConfigurableProductDetail

Name: App:ConfigurableProduct:FilterDefault
Description: Filter default for GetConfigurableProductDetail

Name: App:Shipments:AutoGenerateShipmentBackendIDForInterbranchOrders
Description: Ignore given backendID on shipment create and generate EVA backendID (only on interbranch)

Name: App:OverrulingUserLanguage
Description: when populated this language set in this setting over rules the languages set on the user

Name: App:ShipFromStore:DeterminationType
Description: this setting determines which task should be picked first

Name: App:Order:DisplayUserCustomFields
Description: Shows custom field in the order details panel, based on BackendID

Name: App:Order:ShowFiscalID
Description: Determines whether to show the fiscal ID on the order or not

Name: App:CustomerProductValue
Description: setting to influence which ID is displayed in the pages

Name: App:OrganizationUnit:AirportOU
Description: Determines whether to show the flights tab on the organization unit or not

Name: App:Shipment:UrlContainsSlash
Description: Determines whether a slash still needs to be added or not to make the tracking link clickable

Name: App:RunnerTask:QuickPicking
Description: Determines whether runner tasks can be completed without individual scanning each item

Name: App:Loyalty:DisableScanCard
Description: Disables the scan card option in the loyaly section of CFD app

Name: App:Loyalty:OnboardingQRUrl
Description: Onboarding URL for loyalty members

Name: App:Loyalty:WalletQRUrl
Description: The Add to Apple Wallet URL

Name: App:Order:ShowCustomFields
Description: Determine which order custom fields will show up as order options. values should be backendid

Name: App:Returns:PrefilledOrganizationUnit
Description: When set to true the return is automaticaly assigned to the OU that the merchant is currently using

Name: App:ShowReturnSignatureOnCFD
Description: Indicates whether or not to display request signature from CFD tile on returns in checkout

Name: App:Customer:AccountType
Description: { standard = 0, basic = 1, incognito = 2 }

Name: App:Login:PreferredMethod
Description: Dictates what tab to be opened on login

Name: App:TaskPresence
Description: To influence which tasks are present, { RunnerTask = 1, FullStockCount = 2, RepairTask = 4, MoveStock = 8, ALL = 15}

Name: App:Order:ShowTakeoverAlert
Description: Set to false to disable rogue order takeover alerts

Name: App:Order:IgnoreTakeoverUpdateUsers
Description: User IDs in this array will be ignored by the rogue order takeover alert feature

Name: App:Scanner:Provider
Description: Determines the default scanner to be used

Name: App:Scanner:SupportedSymbologies
Description: Determines the default scanner symbologies that are supported

Name: App:ShowIndicationOnInteractionLogs
Description: When set to true we show an indication on the interactions tab in order and consumer chapter when there are interacts made on the selected item

Name: App:SearchUsers:HideCountryFilter
Description: Hides the country filter in customer search

Name: App:Clientela:BaseUrl
Description: When this setting has a value we show the 'View Customer Details in Clientela' button, which will use the set value as base url to open, which should open the clientela app

Name: App:Product:ShowPriceProductVariations
Description: Determines if we show prices on product variations

Name: App:Customer:ShowCases
Description: Determines if we show customer cases on customers

Name: App:Pos:ShowBarcodeCapture
Description: Determines if we show barcode capture buttons

Name: App:Pos:ScannerProvider
Description: Determines which scanner we use for barcode capture. Choose between'appleScanner' or 'scandit'

Name: App:Pos:ShowBarcodeCaptureOnLogin
Description: This setting will dictates to show (or not) the barcode capture menu option on login/unlock

Name: App:Pos:Scandit:BarcodeCaptureCameraPosition
Description: This setting will dictates what Scandit camera position to use. Choose between 'front' or 'back'

Name: App:Product:OrganizationUnitBackInStock
Description: Determines which WebshopID to use for back in stock notification

Name: App:Scan:Behaviour
Description: Determines the scan behaviour in the app. Can be set to 'button' for manual button press scan or 'auto' for automatic scanning.

Name: App:Orders:DisplayPrefiguredDiscounts
Description: Determines if we show prefigured discounts that only have one unmet requirement in the basket on the sales app

Name: App:HidePendingBankDeposits
Description: Hides the option for pending bank deposits

Name: App:CFD:IsPassive
Description: Determines whether the CFD operates in a passive or active (interactive) mode.

Name: App:Replenishment:GRIDPimPropertiesToDisplay
Description: Determines which properties are displayed in the replenishment product table
